mapper.sql: ORDER_SEQ_NBR, TRANS_DATE, PAYER_NAME, TRANS_AMT, CHANNEL_FEE_AMT, CHANNEL_CODE, PLAT_SEQ_NBR, DOWN_SEQ_NBR, RETURN_CODE, RETURN_MSG, MER_NO, TRANS_TIME, CHECK_DATE, CHECK_STATUS, ORDER_STATUS, CRT_DATE_TIME, DATE_LAST_MAINT
mapper.select: select A.ORDER_SEQ_NBR,A.TRANS_DATE,A.TRANS_AMT,B.DOWN_TRANS_AMT, 'true' as DOWN_EXIST, A.CHANNEL_CODE,A.TRANS_TIME,A.PLAT_SEQ_NBR, A.ORDER_STATUS from CHANNEL_ORDER_PRE_CHECK A, DOWN_ORDER B where A.ORDER_SEQ_NBR = B.ORDER_SEQ_NBR and A.CHANNEL_CODE = #{channelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and A.CHECK_STATUS = #{checkStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} union all select A.ORDER_SEQ_NBR,A.TRANS_DATE,A.TRANS_AMT,B.DOWN_TRANS_AMT, 'false' as DOWN_EXIST, A.CHANNEL_CODE,A.TRANS_TIME,A.PLAT_SEQ_NBR, A.ORDER_STATUS from CHANNEL_ORDER_PRE_CHECK A left join DOWN_ORDER B on A.ORDER_SEQ_NBR = B.ORDER_SEQ_NBR where B.ORDER_SEQ_NBR is null and A.CHANNEL_CODE = #{channelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and A.CHECK_STATUS = #{checkStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by TRANS_TIME desc
